data.title: Algeria – TRAVEL CURRENCIES
data.text:
In Algeria the following currency is used:

The Algerian dinar (DZD): this currency is devided in 100 Santeem. You can recognise the currency by the symbol د.ج.

You probably need to change money when traveling to Algeria. You might want to consider not to bring to much money. A credit card usualy is the easiest way to pay abroad. Withdrawing money at a local ATM is an other option. We strongly advise you to check the possibilities and international fees and charges of your bank or credit card company.

Exchange rates Algerian dinar

According to our most recent information (19 August 2024, 07:55) the Algerian dinar has the following exchange rates.

The exchange rate from your own bank or credit card company will differ somewhat from the exchange rates as mentioned above. Your bank or credit card company might also apply aditional international charges.
